Hi

So sorry I missed this one. I remember what happened, I tried to look at it on my phone but it didn't load. I must have forgotten to mark it as unread. My apologies.

I have just had a quick look and wondered if I can provide some small feedback.

The icons look good but I am wondering if we can perhaps change two of them.

Compaction roller - they are generally not twin drum. The Dynapac is probably a good example of how we would like it to look. I have attached a screenshot. (only if this is possible).

Tipper Truck - the icon has 3 wheels, that is generally for a much bigger truck, ours is not this big (it's a 2 tonne truck). Is there any way we can have a picture of a truck with two wheels please.

Thank you!

Peta
